description: Rangers on Fenerbahce trip, Edinburgh derby build-up and Kilmarnock duo back in training.
title: Rangers expect 'challenging trip' for fans going to Feberbahce tie
title_page: Rangers expect 'challenging trip' for fans going to Feberbahce tie - Scottish gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rangers say the upcoming Europa League tie with Fenerbahce in Turkey on 6 March will be a "challenging trip" for travelling supporters. (Herald - subscription required), external
Steven Naismith never saw his former Rangers team-mate Allan McGregor moving into goalkeeping coaching, with McGregor back at Ibrox as part of interim head coach Barry Ferguson's backroom team. (Sun), external
Hibernian forward Mykola Kuharevich is desperate to score in Sunday's Edinburgh derby. (Record), external
Hearts defender Jamie McCart is relishing the chance to end Hibs' 14-match unbeaten run. (Herald - subscription required), external
McCart says the aerial challenge by St Mirren's Killian Phillips "felt like a red card", with Phillips initially sent off then staying on after a VAR downgraded the offence to a yellow card in Hearts' midweek win. (Record), external
